articles.title: Wallabies, Pumas Set For 1st Of 2 Rugby Championship Matches
articles.description: Australia coach Dave Rennie says the formula his team used to beat South Africa twice in consecutive Rugby Championship matches should work again on Saturday in the first of two against Argentina.
articles.content:

articles.title: Argentine corn planting gets fast start, more rain needed
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Sept 23 (Reuters) - Argentina 2021/22 corn planting has raced out of the blocks as farmers take advantage of good soil moisture levels, but more rain will be needed for growers to complete early season corn sowing plans, the Buenos Aires grains exchange said on Thursday.Argentina is the world's second largest corn exporter and the exchange forecasts a record 55

articles.title: Wallabies team announcement, Dave Rennie overlooks Sean McMahon and names Rob Leota for Rugby Championship game against Argentina
articles.description: Wallabies coach Dave Rennie doesn’t think James O’Connor would have the “wheels from fullback” in his return game from injury, so has opted to ease him back to international competition from the bench against Argentina this Saturday.
articles.content:
Wallabies coach Dave Rennie has overlooked a returning veteran in order to give a younger star his first start in the gold jersey.

articles.title: UPDATE 2-Argentina makes $1.9 bln payment to IMF amid race for new deal
articles.description: Argentina made a near $1.9 billion payment to the International Monetary Fund on Wednesday, two government sources said, as the South American grains producer races to agree a new deal with the lender to revamp the over $40 billion it still owes.
articles.content:
